text: Preciosa (English: Precious) is the fourth LP record by Mexican-American Tejano pop band, Selena y Los Dinos. The album's name was inspired by Selena's nickname. ==Track listing== == Re-Release == This album is was re-released entitled Classic Series, Vol. 4 in 2007. Category:1988 albums Category:Selena albums
title: Preciosa
